name.title: Switch Name
name.description: Display Name you want to give this switch accessory in HomeKit. Each switch must have a unique name.

batteryName.title: Switch Battery Name
batteryName.description: Display Name you want to the fake battery accessory in HomeKit. Each battery must have a unique name. Default: Switch Name Battery

id.title: Switch MAC Address
id.description: MAC address of the switch you want to connect, without colon. You can find this info in the Switchmate app.

layout.description: Provide the details of your switches.
